short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Memory-efficient one-click dark mode that activates on install, deepens dark tones, and eliminates light colors across websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Everdark is a powerful one-click dark mode extension that transforms your browsing experience by eliminating light colors and deepening dark tones across all websites.


Features:

1. Designed for simplicity, Everdark activates automatically upon installation, with no configuration needed.

2. It is optimized to be light on memory, ensuring smooth performance even on pages with mixed content types. 

3. The extension intelligently enhances dark elements while darkening any lighter sections, creating a consistent and immersive dark theme.


How to Start Using Everdark:

1. Open Google Chrome: Launch the Google Chrome browser on your device.
2. Visit the Chrome Web Store: Navigate to the Chrome Web Store using your browser.
3. Search for Everdark: Enter "Everdark" in the search bar and press Enter.
4. Install the Extension: Find Everdark in the results and click "Add to Chrome" to install it.
5. Automatic Activation: Once installed, Everdark will immediately start working on any page you visit.
6.Toggle Dark Mode: You can turn dark mode on or off anytime by clicking the Everdark icon.
7. Enjoy Dark Mode: Experience a beautifully enhanced dark interface while browsing the web.

Privacy Assurance: We do not collect any user data, making Everdark a safe and privacy-conscious choice.

For any issues, users can submit bug reports via the Google Form at https://forms.gle/ZnwGswBS66GsY2kQ6.
